content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Ryanah. The monthly rental price for the 25 square meter apartment is negotiable.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to negotiate the rental price. Can you please tell me the initial price that you have in mind?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Sure, I have an initial price of €1,200 in mind for the 25 square meter apartment. However, I am open to discussing other terms and conditions that you may be interested in.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of €1,200.

Can you please tell me the terms and conditions of the rental agreement?

I want to be on good terms with my landlord, so I want to make sure I understand the responsibilities that come with this rental agreement.

Additionally, I would like to know the process for renewing or terminating the rental agreement.

Finally, are there any fees or other charges that I should be aware of?

Thank you for your help.

Best regards,

Ryanah Rahman
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for agreeing to the rental price of €1,200, Ryanah.

The terms and conditions of the rental agreement will be outlined in the lease agreement that you will sign upon moving into the apartment. The lease agreement will include details such as the length of the rental term, the responsibilities of both the landlord and the tenant, and any penalties for breaking the lease early.

To renew the rental agreement, you will need to provide notice to the landlord in accordance with the terms of the lease agreement. If you wish to terminate the rental agreement, you will also need to provide notice to the landlord in accordance with the terms of the lease agreement.

There may be additional fees or charges associated with the rental agreement, such as security deposits or move-in fees. These fees and charges will be outlined in the lease agreement.

I hope this information helps you understand the terms and conditions of the rental agreement. If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to ask.

Best regards,

Heinrich Heine
name: Heinrich Heine
